import React, { useState } from "react"; import NavBar from "./NavBar"; const Alumni = () => { const [alumniName,setAlumniName] = useState("") const [placedAt,setPlacedAt] = useState("") const [about,setAbout] = useState("") const [url,setUrl] = useState("") const [time, setTime] = useState(0); const [result, setResult] = useState([]); const setitem = (data) => { setResult([ { data: data, }, ]); }; async function getAlumniDetail() { try { const response = await fetch( // "https://arcane-brushlands-01906.herokuapp.com/api/read", `http://localhost:3020/api/alumni/read` ); const data = await response.json(); setitem(data.result); console.log(data.result); // const re = data.result; console.log(result[0].data); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } if (time == 0) { getAlumniDetail(); setTime(1); } return (
IIT BHILAI JEMS
{result.length != 0 && ( <> {result[0].data.map((alumni) => ( <>

{alumni.alumniName}

{alumni.placedAt}

{alumni.about}

Connect
))} )}
setBlog(e.target.value)} type="text" required >
{localStorage.getItem("email") == "anshukumar@iitbhilai.ac.in" && ( <>

Add Alumni

(*You must have authentication for adding new alumni)

setAlumniName(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Name" required > setPlacedAt(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Placed At" required >

setAbout(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="About" required > setUrl(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="LinkedIn URL" required >


)} {localStorage.getItem("email") != "anshukumar@iitbhilai.ac.in" && ( <>

Add Alumni

(*You must have authentication for adding new alumni)

setAlumniName(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Name" required disabled > setPlacedAt(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="Placed At" required disabled >

setAbout(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="About" required disabled > setUrl(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder="LinkedIn URL" required disabled >


)}
); }; export default Alumni;
